azurerm_app_service_active_slot.description: Promotes an App Service Slot to Production within an App Service

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the App Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

app_service_name.description: The name of the App Service within which the Slot exists.  Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

app_service_slot_name.description: The name of the App Service Slot which should be promoted to the Production Slot within the App Service.
